ivardefs.name: active
ivardefs.desc:
Indicates the period of time over which the account is allowed to have transactions posted to it.
This period may be different to the coveragePeriod which is the duration of time that services may occur.

ivardefs.name: balance
ivardefs.desc: Represents the sum of all credits less all debits associated with the account.  Might be positive, zero or negative.

ivardefs.name: coverage_
ivardefs.desc: The party(s) that are responsible for covering the payment of this account, and what order should they be applied to the account.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: Provides additional information about what the account tracks and how it is used.

ivardefs.name: guarantor_
ivardefs.desc: Parties financially responsible for the account.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Unique identifier used to reference the account.  May or may not be intended for human use (e.g. credit card number).

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: Name used for the account when displaying it to humans in reports, etc.

ivardefs.name: owner
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the organization, department, etc. with responsibility for the account.

ivardefs.name: period
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the period of time the account applies to; e.g. accounts created per fiscal year, quarter, etc.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: Indicates whether the account is presently used/usable or not.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the patient, device, practitioner, location or other object the account is associated with.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: Categorizes the account for reporting and searching purposes.
